author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Steven Erikson’s Midnight Tides is a book that starts with a sigh and ends with tears. Philosophical as ever, Erikson’s fifth entry in Malazan: Book of the Fallen takes us to a new continent with a new batch of characters. Through brilliant dialogue and awe-inspiring world-building, Midnight Tides stands as one of the best novels […]

The post REVIEW: Midnight Tides by Steven Erikson appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Midnight Tides by Steven Erikson
